name: Contrast (itch) (dutchlish)
description:
Welcome to Contrast, a meditative piano based bouncing game.

Use A and D to move left and right.

Press S to boost downwards.

Hold W to shift up to the level of the black notes.

Hold left shift to move quicker.

Land on the highlighted note to score points, you have until the music has stopped to accumulate points.

Note: I ran out of time to add a high score system, so screenshot your high scores :) 

Credits:

Programming and game design: Mike Bailey

Piano notes

Pack: 88  Piano keys by TEDAgame 

https://freesound.org/people/TEDAgame/packs/25405/
